# 7.0 Docs

## Serialization

- [BinaryFormatter serialization APIs produce compiler errors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/7.0/binaryformatter-apis-produce-errors.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where serialize and deserialize methods on BinaryFormatter, Formatter, and IFormatter are obsolete as errors.
- [SerializationFormat.Binary is obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/7.0/serializationformat-binary.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in core .NET libraries where binary serialization and deserialization of DataSet and DataTable objects is obsolete.
- [DataContractSerializer retains sign when deserializing -0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/7.0/datacontractserializer-negative-sign.md): Learn about the .NET 6/7 breaking change in serialization where DataContractSerializer retains the negative sign when deserializing the value "-0" as a float or double.
- [Deserialize Version type with leading or trailing whitespace](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/7.0/deserialize-version-with-whitespace.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change for deserializing Version types with leading or trailing whitespace.
- [JsonSerializerOptions copy constructor includes JsonSerializerContext](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/7.0/jsonserializeroptions-copy-constructor.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in serialization where the JsonSerializerOptions copy constructor now includes JsonSerializerContext.
- [Polymorphic serialization for object types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/7.0/polymorphic-serialization.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in serialization where System.Text.Json no longer hardcodes polymorphism for root-level object types.
- [System.Text.Json source generator fallback](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/serialization/7.0/reflection-fallback.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in serialization where the System.Text.Json source generator no longer fall backs to reflection-based serialization for unrecognized types.
